block_comment: This line of Verilog RTL assigns the "data_rj" signal to data from the "rjmem" memory at the index "rjread" if the "read_enable" signal is high. If the "read_enable" signal is not active(low), the "data_rj" signal is assigned with the 16-bit binary value of zero. This assignment operation happens concurrently and not sequentially.
